Articles.Content: Can any body teach me how to make a mod? Ive google it and found nothing. If any body can help me, please do. Thanks.

There is information on the wiki: http://184.154.141.114/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page

Also, check out the Plugin Development forum, I am sure they will be happy to answer any specific questions you have.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=39.0
Thanks for your reply. It really helps
Ok. I have made my mod. Now how do I add custom sounds to it? Thanks for the reply (If any body replys)

Repost your question in this board: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=39.0

Or ask a moderator to move this thread there, you are more likely to get an answer.
